javadoc:
Event that gets passed to a listener to indicate that a user changed 
 one of the choices in the row of a table that is part of the 
 VerticalChoicesPanel or VariousChoicesPanel.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a new event that gets passed to a listener to indicate that 
 a user changed one of the choices in the row of a table that is part 
 of the VerticalChoicesPanel or VariousChoicesPanel.

params.name: source
params.comment: the component where the change happened.

params.name: row
params.comment: the row where the user changed a choice

params.name: choice
params.comment: the new choice value for the row

methods.javadoc: Returns the row where the change occurred.
methods.name: getRow
methods.comment: Returns the row where the change occurred.

methods.javadoc: Returns the new choice value for the row.
methods.name: getChoice
methods.comment: Returns the new choice value for the row.

name: ResolveConflictChangeEvent
comment:
Event that gets passed to a listener to indicate that a user changed 
 one of the choices in the row of a table that is part of the 
 VerticalChoicesPanel or VariousChoicesPanel.
